title: Making Paid Internships the Standard: A Global Lens
summary: Produced by RTI International, this report draws on the input of employers, students, policymakers, and others to identify promising practices in paid internship opportunities and highlight strategies that may be replicated elsewhere in order to increase the scale and impact of paid internships and other work-based learning around the globe.
tag-1: Making Paid Internships the Standard: A Global Lens
